thread.title: Extremely Tall Basketball Teen Debuts In Ohio
thread.title_full: Extremely Tall Basketball Teen Debuts In Ohio

author: Samer Kalaf
title: Extremely Tall Basketball Teen Debuts In Ohio
text:
Go to permalink 
Romanian basketball player Robert Bobroczkyi, who was 7-foot-6 and 184 pounds at last check in 2015, is now 7-foot-7 and 190 pounds. The Italian pasta strategy does not appear to have filled him out. Italy Plans To Fix Tall, Awkward Basketball Kid With Pasta Italy Plans To Fix Tall, Awkward Basketball Kid With Pasta Italy Plans To Fix Tall, Awkward Basketball Kid… Robert Bobroczkyi is a 7-foot-6, 184-pound Romanian, and of course, he plays basketball.… Read more Read more 
The 16-year-old Bobroczkyi, who’s taller than any current NBA player, saw some minutes and towered over his teammates in SPIRE Institute’s varsity game last week. MaxPreps has a few highlights, including Bobroczkyi’s effort on the tipoff: 
After the game, Bobroczkyi sounded ready to eat more: Advertisement 
“I’m eating 4,000 calories per day and want to weigh between 220-230 pounds by the end of this season. I’m also working on my speed, mobility and every part of my game.”
